title: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, August 2, 2013
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, August 2, 2013
teaser: Remember the phone hacking by tabloids in Britain: Are other big corporations up to similar things? The latest monthly jobs numbers for July. And in Camden, NJ, one small doctor's office tries to make a big gain in holding down costs by moving closer to the sickest seniors.
byline: Queena Kim, Gigi Douban, D Gorenstein, Bruce Johnson, Sam Beard, Mitchell Hartman, David Brancaccio and Jonathan Karp
description: Remember the phone hacking by tabloids in Britain: Are other big corporations up to similar things? The latest monthly jobs numbers for July. And in Camden, NJ, one small doctor's office tries to make a big gain in holding down costs by moving closer to the sickest seniors.
